title: Episode 128: Do Brain Training Games Work?
description: You've probably heard about these Brain Training games.  Do they really help you to keep your mind sharp?  Will they prevent cognitive decline or slow the effects of alzheimer's disease?  In this episode I review some recent studies on the effectiveness (or lack thereof) of these popular games.
